handist.collections.glb

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.glb.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object
    Helper class for the settings that influence the behavior of the Global Load Balancer. All the settings presented here can be set by passing -D arguments to the java command. As an alternative, you could also set them with System.setProperty(String, String). In the later case, be aware that parts of the program may have already performed initializations based on the value present before you made the change. Also, make sure that you make your changes consistent across all hosts participating in the computation.
    Author:
    Patrick Finnerty

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Config.LifelineAnswerMode
      Handy enumarator used by the GLB routines to determine which mode should be used to make lifeline answers

      Default value for GRANULARITY option.
      static String LIFELINE_STRATEGY
      Option used to set the work-stealing network between the hosts involved in the computation.

      Default value for LIFELINE_STRATEGY.

      Option used to set the maximum number of concurrent workers used by the load balancer.

      • MAXIMUM_WORKER_COUNT

        public static final String MAXIMUM_WORKER_COUNT
        Option used to set the maximum number of concurrent workers used by the load balancer. By default, the value returned by Runtime.availableProcessors() is used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERIALIZATION

        public static final String SERIALIZATION
        Determines the technique used to answer lifelines. Options are:
        • "kryo" (default option) which uses normal lambda serialization to transmit instances
        • "mpi" which relies on MPI to transmit the byte array into which the object instances have been serialized
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERIALIZATION_MPI

        public static final String SERIALIZATION_MPI

        See Also:

      • getGranularity

        public static int getGranularity()
        Retrieves the granularity to use as defined either by the GRANULARITY_DEFAULT property (if set) or by the default value 100.
        Returns:
        the granularity to be used by the GLB as an integer

      • getLifelineClassName

        public static String getLifelineClassName()
        Returns the lifeline class as defined in the JVM settings
        Returns:
        the fully qualified name of the lifeline class to be used

      • getLifelineSerializationMode

        public static Config.LifelineAnswerMode getLifelineSerializationMode()
        Indicates which type of lifeline answer should be made
        Returns:
        a value indicating which type of lifeline answer should be made

      • getMaximumConcurrentWorkers

        public static int getMaximumConcurrentWorkers()
        Returns the number of concurrent workers with which the GLB is configured to run. Checks if the "glb.workers" property was set. If so, parses this property. Otherwise, uses the value returned by Runtime.availableProcessors().
        Returns:
        the number of concurrent workers with which the GLB can run

      • printConfiguration

        public static void printConfiguration(PrintStream out)
        Prints the configuration settings set for the GLB which this class handles on the specified output stream
        Parameters:
        out - the output on which the configuration should be printed to.
